FileReaderReadAsArrayBuffer.summary:
The interface's
readAsArrayBuffer() method is used to start reading the
contents of a specified or . When the read
operation is finished, the becomes
DONE, and the is
triggered. At that time, the attribute
contains an representing the file's data.

blockquote.para:
Note: The method is a newer promise-based API to read a
file as an array buffer.
